user_query: I'm planning a fun-filled weekend getaway with my friends and I want to make it unforgettable. Can you suggest some exciting cocktail recipes that I can prepare for the trip? Also, provide me with a playlist of energetic songs to keep the party vibe alive. Additionally, find a comfortable and affordable accommodation option near the beach.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of exciting cocktail recipes suitable for a weekend getaway.
Create an energetic party playlist to enhance the vibe of the trip.
Search for comfortable and affordable accommodation options near the beach.
